intro: Matisia amplifolia, commonly known as the broadleaf matisia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it typically grows in humid lowland forests. Matisia amplifolia is valued for its ornamental appeal and has been used in traditional medicine in some regions.
